import React, {useState} from 'react' import Cloud from '../../images/cloud-upload.svg' import Call from '../../images/call.svg' import Direction from '../../images/directions.svg' import Img from '../../images/image.svg' const OrderList = ({name, address, tel, status, orderDetail}) => { const [slide, setSlide] = useState(false); // Sliding Div console.log(orderDetail); return ( <>

setSlide(!slide)}>{name}

{address}

{status}
{slide &&
LTGOA000001 {orderDetail.name}
Normal pickup
Call 10 mins before pick up
}
) } export default OrderList
